title: Animal, Vegetable or Mineral
description: From a meticulous mouse, to a superstar spring onion, Dick and Dom present some of the top 50 stories from the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show 500 Words competition 2018
itunes:subtitle: Written for kids, by kids: unusual stories and unexpected talents!
